attributes.action: Make Falklands War Veteran Simon Weston a Sir
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the 25th Anniversary of the Falklands War, this is an appropriate time for Simon Weston to be knighted. In spite of the horrific injuries he received during the Falklands conflict, Simon has undertaken charity work tirelessly for many years. Although his achievements have previously been marked with an OBE, his services to charity should be further recognised. He is an inspiration to many people in the UK and throughout the world and so should be honoured as Sir Simon Weston.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
